attributes.action: To provide a free portrait of Her Majesty the Queen
attributes.background: Currently the Canadians and Australians can get a free portrait of the Queen. This should be extended to her subjects here in the UK as well. £92 is simply too expensive for many. Whether as a physical delivery or download of an official portrait, or both, it should be available to all for free.

rejection.details: Royal Images are responsible for the sale and distribution of Royal Portraits, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out how to contact them here: https://www.royalimages.co.uk/contact-us-2-w.asp
